name: Ring of Echo
description: A silver ring that allows the wearer to perfectly mimic any sound heard

name: Tome of Forgotten Lore
description: A book whose pages reveal different content to each reader

description: Usable: Synth cylinder etched with fine, glowing lines

description: Usable: Explosive device or ceramic sphere (thrown, short range), handheld projector (long range)

Internal: Electronic smoking implement
